html:
3.10.20  10:45 pm   How do you get you song mixes sounding so good,

     the more songs you make, the better they will sound while you simultaneously panic about how good they could sound but still don't yet. that's just what happens

      do you master yourself

     yes, but i prefer not to call it mastering because that kind of makes no sense. i prefer to call it 'trying to make sure the whole thing doesn't sound like crap before i release it'

     and did you study music technology?

     a little bit each time i make music

3.10.20  9:28 pm   how do i build a robot

     you could get a robot to do it

3.10.20  9:19 pm   Would you ever post a daily vlog, but it's only in your house? 

     yes i think so

3.10.20  9:16 pm   How is it going bill

     pretty good

3.10.20  8:32 pm   if the rest of the universe is up in the sky, is the planet just really down?

     yes, but that's because the word down was originally defined in reference toward the planet itself

3.10.20  8:16 pm   When did you think the universe started to give you back what you were/are trying to give to it?

     first i had to start learning to give back what it had given to me

3.10.20  7:49 pm   How to deal with posting stuff online? Whenever I  get like notifications on one of my art accounts, I just freeze up.

     it might be good to find a place where you don't get any notifications, so you can get a chance to get used to posting. then as soon as you get comfortable posting, then i think you will feel ready for some notification

3.10.20  7:20 pm   i have so many ideas for stories to write but i seem to only be able to imagine them in my mind. it's hard to put them into words, and by the time i figure it out, i'm bored of the concept and want to move on. is this normal?

     yes

      any advice on how to fix it?

     a combination of many different approaches. in some ways you will increase the efficiency of capturing the ideas. in another way, you will get better at working with and harvesting previously captured ideas. it's also good to keep a casual journal, because there is quite a surplus of good news, your situation is a net positive, and i think you will discover that readily once you get all your thoughts in order

3.10.20  6:58 pm   Its raining

     that may be true

3.10.20  6:50 pm   "It's the end of the world, and I just can't wait, know that you can relate" Did you wrote this especially for me ?

     i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

3.10.20  6:15 pm   Are you aware of your value to your fans?( like me and millions of other people)

     holy hackensack you are very friendly

3.10.20  5:52 pm   can you describe the societal impact of coronavirus using a quote from one of your songs? (i'd go with "all the things i'm supposed to do / and the places i'm supposed to go / are cancelled / oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh")

     take a ride on my blimp (oh it's a very strong blimp)

3.10.20  5:46 pm   do you have any opinions 

     no way

3.10.20  5:12 pm   can i not be scared

     yes, that sounds fantastic

3.10.20  4:50 pm   What's the world up to?

     being strong

3.10.20  4:48 pm   do you think everything already exists and we just dont remember until it happens? :*

     i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

3.10.20  4:35 pm   Do you think it would be useful if music notation innately worked in 3 dimensions instead of two, like if you could assign some kind of variable to that Z axis where standard notation is only written on the X and Y? Maybe it's all a little silly.

     that could work

3.10.20  3:54 pm   What are the inspirations for your music? 

     bumps,

3.10.20  3:18 pm   How can you make boring work bearable?

     try to do another job at the same time, to make it more interesting

3.10.20  3:14 pm   Do you think NASA invented thunderstorms to cover up the sound of space battles?

     no

3.10.20  3:13 pm   Are you happy?

     not sure

     How often?

     sometimes i like to set up a nice little fort, right on the staircase between moods

3.10.20  2:55 pm   you're not planning on making a feature film, are you?

     i would certainly appreciate having that skillset

3.10.20  2:54 pm   What's the answer to life?

     life is the answer. the question is literally anything else

3.10.20  2:46 pm   can't think of a question. what kind of questions do you recommend?

     what kind of answers do you recommend

3.10.20  2:31 pm   did you try to try and consider trying the idea of trying

     yes i have done that before

3.10.20  2:20 pm   thoughts on corona virus

     it's kind of like a pop quiz

3.10.20  2:20 pm   thoughts on the year 1983

     drummers might have still had jobs

3.10.20  1:35 pm   Do you know what today is?

      yes but it may be other things too

3.10.20  11:44 am   when is your next video

     i am having a countdown timer

3.10.20  11:40 am   what type of clock do you prefer?

     24

3.10.20  10:47 am   Bill I thank you so much for your videos. I was in a really depressing state since I lost my mother, but you're videos made me so happy:) you really deserve a novel prize for being a really amusing person

     holy skyward land shark you are very friendly

3.10.20  10:27 am   am i bread?

     no, but i see what you are getting at

3.10.20  9:43 am   Did you ever make it to the southpole by nightfall?

      i must have made it there at some point, because the video got made and it does include the south pole

3.10.20  9:19 am   any strong feelings towards week feelings?

     there have been times where i've wished the week was 10 days. and while i would be able to invent a 10 day schedule, the existing week is actually so strong and well established in society that to mess with it seems unwise, and un-strong. there is nothing quite as solid, valid, and credible as the existing 7 day week. it's famous

3.10.20  8:54 am   Are we gonna have to get those red and blue lense cardboard 3D glasses to watch your new videos?

     i've tried red and blue, it makes your whole brain ache. taking them off is scary too, because for a few minutes you think your eyes now see blue/red (the opposite of what you were wearing). also the occlusion on the red side is terribly unreliable. i cannot responsibly recommend it to any audience and will not be using that format

3.10.20  8:53 am   What's an old song available on your website (up to 2014) that you can still listen to without being filled with the pure terror of knowledge that you made the song

     hey mom i beat the scale

3.10.20  8:44 am   so i don't know if you've seen the question but i'm sick af and am currently quarantined for 2 weeks. what's a good way to pass the time?

     learn another language, drink a lot of water,

3.10.20  8:37 am   Is the world made out of 3d?

     in 3d

3.10.20  7:38 am   What are your thoughts on MsPaint?

     never heard of it

3.10.20  7:21 am   Why do you answer ueqstions so early?

     you don't know when i answer questions, but why do you ask them so early

     You need sleep!

     that's true, but it's not because i'm answering them early. it is because i'm answering them late

3.10.20  6:45 am   When are you finish with school 

     school is never finished, especially when you are making your own school

3.10.20  6:38 am   what famous artist do you like the most?

     mario from mario paint

3.10.20  6:32 am   If you could make a new instrument, what would it be? 

     i'm making it now, i'll show you

3.10.20  5:44 am   yes uh are u gonna release a 1 hour video on the vietnam war or no

     absolutely not

3.10.20  5:21 am   what the fuck is that countdown timer at right now

     14

3.10.20  5:10 am   ok random question: do you play roblox?

     that's not a random question at all. that is a very common, ordinary question which i have received many times before

3.10.20  5:08 am   Do you remember the day we pretended to be every star in the sky?

     no but i will admit that does sound sort of familiar

3.10.20  3:52 am   Why is my life horrible 

     to prepare for better times

3.10.20  3:38 am   when singing variations, do you sometimes slip and sing the one from a different verse?

     yes absolutely

     i seem to have a real problem with those.

     everyone does

3.10.20  3:28 am   do you think having perfect pitch makes composing faster for you cause you already know what note's in your head?

     'absolute pitch' is not actually the best way to do that, but it could be useful for getting the very first note, if you happen to have been stranded in the desert for any number of decades
